trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> objects and implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 对象的强类型集合并实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> 接口，以支持在该集合中导航。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>类提供的强类型的集合<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: 它将存储<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>内部中从零开始的数组的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can modify a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects:
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合时创建，第一个，然后使用以下方法来添加、 复制和删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象：

trans-unit.source: To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要复制<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个只读的<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>，该集合不允许添加、 复制和删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，使用静态<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>通过返回的集合<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A>方法是只读的按原样<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>时返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>上访问属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>从返回的对象提供程序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常，如果你尝试修改只读<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>通过设置的默认索引器属性或通过使用任何以下方法：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性检查集合，然后再调用上面的列表中的任何方法。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to add elements to a custom site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何将元素添加到自定义网站地图提供商提供。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object is removed from its position at the second element of the internal array using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method and is appended to the array with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed when executing the standard behavior of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" />方法允许实施者定义执行的基础的标准行为时必须执行的过程<see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />对象。

trans-unit.source: By defining the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" />方法，实施者可以添加功能到继承的方法而无需重写所有其他方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method is called anytime the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection is used via a reference to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" />随时调用方法<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />集合使用通过引用<see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />接口。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个只读集合，其中包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> 集合中的节点。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> with the same <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> elements and structure as the original <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 与原始 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> 具有相同 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 元素和结构的只读 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: You can test whether a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is read-only by checking the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试是否<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合是只读的通过检查<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> property also returns `true` when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsFixedSize%2A>属性也会返回`true`时<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to test whether a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is read-only or modifiable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性来测试是否<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合是只读的还是可修改。

trans-unit.source: If `siteNodes` is modifiable, `MoveNode` is called on it; otherwise, a clone <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is created, using `siteNodes` as a base.
trans-unit.target: 如果`siteNodes`可修改，`MoveNode`调用它; 否则为克隆<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>使用的创建`siteNodes`为基础。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection supports read and search operations, but does not support the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="Overload:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" /> methods, nor the setter on the default indexer property, <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 只读<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />集合支持读取和搜索操作，但不支持<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />， <see cref="Overload:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange" />， <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear" />， <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />， <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />方法，也不上的默认索引器 setter属性， <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object from a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection, and then append the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>是同步，其他线程仍可以修改<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>，这将导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，你可以锁定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>在整个枚举期间或捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。
